official_title: A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to correct certain erosion problems along the banks of the Warrior River near Moundville, Alabama.
short_title: Fort Toulouse Erosion Correction Act of 1983

summary.text: Fort Toulouse Erosion Correction Act of 1983 - Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to take necessary streambank erosion control measures on the Warrior River to protect Mound State Park, Alabama. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Fort Toulouse Erosion Correction Act of 1983
A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of the Army to correct certain erosion problems along the banks of the Warrior River near Moundville, Alabama.
